Reopening bug.

The internal error only happens if the search was kicked off while indexing was 
still executing.  As soon as the indexing is done, the error occurs.

The error does not occur if the search was kicked off after the indexing was 
done.
PR was not targeted to any particular release. Changing target milestone to 2.1

Since this is very old now, and in general the concurrency of index clients is being handled much better, I'm going to resolve this as WORKSFORME.  If anyone is still seeing synchronization issues between search and the index please open a new bug.
